name: Long Name ChungHee
description:
"Haayansool Rice Brewing Mix Custom Recipe App"

This app is designed to help consumers customize their own unique makgeolli using the Haayansool Rice Brewing Mix. With step-by-step guides, ingredient suggestions, and fermentation tips, users can explore a wide variety of personalized recipesâ€”from fruity blends to herbal infusions. Whether you're a beginner or an enthusiast, the app makes home brewing easy, creative, and fun.
